Science magazine has featured the collaborative work of the Cresko, Johnson, and Holzapfel/Bradshaw labs in its special Human Genome 10th Anniversary coverage!

This prestigious recognition highlights how our collaborative research on evolutionary genomics exemplifies the transformative impact of genomic technologies in the decade following the Human Genome Project's completion.

The coverage recognizes:

- Evolutionary genomics advances
- RAD-seq technology impact
- Non-model organism genomics
- Collaborative research success
- Technological innovation
